tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerPreferences ( 
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    name VARCHAR(50), 
    age INT, 
    gender VARCHAR(10), 
    travel_preferences VARCHAR(100) 
);

CREATE TABLE BookingHistory ( 
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    customer_id INT, 
    booking_date DATE, 
    destination VARCHAR(100), 
    total_price DECIMAL(10, 2) 
);

CREATE TABLE TravelItineraries ( 
    itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    booking_id INT, 
    itinerary_details TEXT, 
    itinerary_date DATE, 
    status VARCHAR(20) 
);

CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    age INT
);

CREATE TABLE booking_history (
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    booking_date DATE,
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    amount_paid DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE travel_itineraries (
    itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    booking_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    activities TEXT,
    accommodation VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  preferred_destination VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE booking_history (
  booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  booking_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_preferences(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE travel_itineraries (
  itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  booking_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  destination VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (booking_id) REFERENCES booking_history(booking_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  booking_id INT,
  rating INT,
  comments TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_preferences(customer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (booking_id) REFERENCES booking_history(booking_id)
);
